title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.15 - Layoff wagers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5329.15 - Layoff wagers

State Regulations

An operator may, in its discretion, accept a layoff wager
from another New York State licensed operator. Any such wager shall be placed
in the name of the operator itself. A layoff wager and, if applicable, a
resultant payout shall not be included in the calculation of sports pool gross
gaming revenue. Each layoff wager shall be reported to the commission in such
manner as the commission may direct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5329.15

Adopted

New

York State Register June 26, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 26, eff. 6/26/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
